mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN T1.VST_CNFMDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE NVL(T1.WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD,'N') END AS WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD , T1.WK_ACPTE_DT , T1.WK_ACPTE_HH , T1.VST_CNFMDT , CASE WHEN T2.IN_CHNL_DV_CD != '5' AND T1.VST_CNFM_HH IN ('010000','020000','030000') THEN '000000' ELSE T1.VST_CNFM_HH END AS VST_CMFM_HH , T1.WK_EXCN_DT , T1.WK_EXCN_HH , T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , CASE WHEN T3.INST_ING_CNT = 0 AND T3.INST_END_CNT = T3.REMV_END_CNT AND T3.REMV_END_CNT > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RTNGD_YN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT I1.CNTR_NO , I1.CNTR_SN , SUM(CASE WHEN I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1110' AND I2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS INST_ING_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1110' AND I2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS INST_END_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3460' AND I2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REMV_END_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ I1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ I2 ON I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ I3 ON I3.CNTR_NO = I1.CNTR_NO AND I3.CNTR_SN = I1.CNTR_SN WHERE I3.IST_DT IS NULL AND I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD IN ('1110','4110','3460') AND I2.CNTR_NO = #{CNTR_NO} GROUP BY I1.CNTR_NO , I1.CNTR_SN ) T3 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = '00' WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{CNTR_NO} AND T2.AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{AS_IST_OJ_NO} AND T1.CNTR_SN = '00' AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('9','1','4')
